list.name: Changes
list.comment:
# Ringkasan Perubahan — Production Readiness Nusantara
## 1. Perbaikan Bug / Critical
### 1.1 Autoload NusantaraSeeder - **Masalah:** Class `Nusantara\Database\Seeders\NusantaraSeeder` tidak ter-autoload → `php artisan nusantara:seed` error "Class not found". - **Perubahan:** Di `composer.json` ditambah `"classmap": ["database/seeders"]` pada `autoload`. - **File:** `composer.json`
### 1.2 Cache::flush() tidak lengkap - **Masalah:** `flush()` hanya menghapus key `provinces`; key lain (regencies, districts, villages, postal) tetap di cache. - **Perubahan:** - Jika cache store mendukung tags (Redis, Memcached): `get()` dan `forget()` memakai tag `nusantara`, `flush()` memanggil `tags(['nusantara'])->flush()`. - Jika tidak (file/database): fallback tetap hanya menghapus key `provinces`. - **File:** `src/Support/Cache.php`
---
## 2. CI / Workflow
### 2.1 Laravel 12 di matrix - **Perubahan:** Laravel `12.*` ditambah ke matrix GitHub Actions (dengan exclude PHP 8.1 × 12). - **File:** `.github/workflows/tests.yml`
---
## 3. Unit & Feature Tests Baru
### 3.1 Unit — Cache - **File:** `tests/Unit/CacheTest.php` - **Isi:** Key helpers (`keyProvinces`, `keyRegencies`, dll), `get()` dengan TTL 0 vs TTL > 0, `forget()`, `flush()`.
### 3.2 Unit — RegionCollection - **File:** `tests/Unit/RegionCollectionTest.php` - **Isi:** `whereName()`, `codes()`, `names()`, `toDropdown()`, `titleCase()`, `toTitleCase()`.
### 3.3 Unit — RegionLevel - **File:** `tests/Unit/RegionLevelTest.php` - **Isi:** `fromCode()` tiap level, `label()`, edge case (empty, trim).
### 3.4 Unit — Nusantara - **File:** `tests/Unit/NusantaraTest.php` - **Isi:** `find()`, `coordinates()`, `regencies()` (by code/nama), `postalCodes()`, `hierarchy()`, edge cases.
### 3.5 Feature — Commands - **InstallCommand:** `tests/Feature/InstallCommandTest.php` — publish config, install dengan `--migrate`. - **SeedCommand:** `tests/Feature/SeedCommandTest.php` — validasi driver & `--only`, sukses seed. - **ClearCacheCommand:** `tests/Feature/ClearCacheCommandTest.php` — perintah berjalan sukses.
---
## 4. Perbaikan Test yang Sudah Ada
- **PostalCodeResolverTest:** Assertion untuk kode pos 40114/40132 menerima tipe string atau int (karena data bisa keduanya). - **RegionCollectionTest:** Expected `toTitleCase('DKI JAKARTA')` disesuaikan menjadi `"Dki Jakarta"` (sesuai perilaku per kata). - **NusantaraTest:** Assertion `postalCodes()` menerima elemen string atau int.
---
## 5. Dokumentasi & Konfigurasi
### 5.1 CHANGELOG - **File:** `CHANGELOG.md` - **Isi:** Format Keep a Changelog, section [Unreleased] + rilis awal 1.0.0.
### 5.2 .env.example - **File:** `.env.example` - **Isi:** NUSANTARA_DRIVER, NUSANTARA_CACHE_TTL, NUSANTARA_CACHE_STORE, NUSANTARA_DATA_PATH, NUSANTARA_FUZZY_THRESHOLD, NUSANTARA_SEARCH_MAX_RESULTS.
### 5.3 README — Testing - **Perubahan:** Penjelasan cara generate coverage: `--coverage-text` dan `--coverage-html build/coverage` (dengan PCOV/Xdebug).
### 5.4 phpunit.xml - **Perubahan:** Konfigurasi coverage report dihapus dari XML agar `phpunit` default exit 0 tanpa driver coverage; coverage dijalankan lewat opsi CLI.
---
## 6. File yang Ditambah / Diubah (Daftar)
| Aksi | File | |--------|------| | Edit | `composer.json` | | Edit | `src/Support/Cache.php` | | Edit | `.github/workflows/tests.yml` | | Tambah | `tests/Unit/CacheTest.php` | | Tambah | `tests/Unit/RegionCollectionTest.php` | | Tambah | `tests/Unit/RegionLevelTest.php` | | Tambah | `tests/Unit/NusantaraTest.php` | | Tambah | `tests/Feature/InstallCommandTest.php` | | Tambah | `tests/Feature/SeedCommandTest.php` | | Tambah | `tests/Feature/ClearCacheCommandTest.php` | | Edit | `tests/Unit/PostalCodeResolverTest.php` | | Edit | `tests/Unit/RegionCollectionTest.php` (assertion) | | Edit | `tests/Unit/NusantaraTest.php` (assertion) | | Tambah | `CHANGELOG.md` | | Tambah | `.env.example` | | Edit | `README.md` | | Edit | `phpunit.xml` |

task.summary:
# Ringkasan Perubahan — Production Readiness Nusantara
## 1. Perbaikan Bug / Critical
### 1.1 Autoload NusantaraSeeder - **Masalah:** Class `Nusantara\Database\Seeders\NusantaraSeeder` tidak ter-autoload → `php artisan nusantara:seed` error "Class not found". - **Perubahan:** Di `composer.json` ditambah `"classmap": ["database/seeders"]` pada `autoload`. - **File:** `composer.json`
### 1.2 Cache::flush() tidak lengkap - **Masalah:** `flush()` hanya menghapus key `provinces`; key lain (regencies, districts, villages, postal) tetap di cache. - **Perubahan:** - Jika cache store mendukung tags (Redis, Memcached): `get()` dan `forget()` memakai tag `nusantara`, `flush()` memanggil `tags(['nusantara'])->flush()`. - Jika tidak (file/database): fallback tetap hanya menghapus key `provinces`. - **File:** `src/Support/Cache.php`
---
## 2. CI / Workflow
### 2.1 Laravel 12 di matrix - **Perubahan:** Laravel `12.*` ditambah ke matrix GitHub Actions (dengan exclude PHP 8.1 × 12). - **File:** `.github/workflows/tests.yml`
---
## 3. Unit & Feature Tests Baru
### 3.1 Unit — Cache - **File:** `tests/Unit/CacheTest.php` - **Isi:** Key helpers (`keyProvinces`, `keyRegencies`, dll), `get()` dengan TTL 0 vs TTL > 0, `forget()`, `flush()`.
### 3.2 Unit — RegionCollection - **File:** `tests/Unit/RegionCollectionTest.php` - **Isi:** `whereName()`, `codes()`, `names()`, `toDropdown()`, `titleCase()`, `toTitleCase()`.
### 3.3 Unit — RegionLevel - **File:** `tests/Unit/RegionLevelTest.php` - **Isi:** `fromCode()` tiap level, `label()`, edge case (empty, trim).
### 3.4 Unit — Nusantara - **File:** `tests/Unit/NusantaraTest.php` - **Isi:** `find()`, `coordinates()`, `regencies()` (by code/nama), `postalCodes()`, `hierarchy()`, edge cases.
### 3.5 Feature — Commands - **InstallCommand:** `tests/Feature/InstallCommandTest.php` — publish config, install dengan `--migrate`. - **SeedCommand:** `tests/Feature/SeedCommandTest.php` — validasi driver & `--only`, sukses seed. - **ClearCacheCommand:** `tests/Feature/ClearCacheCommandTest.php` — perintah berjalan sukses.
---
## 4. Perbaikan Test yang Sudah Ada
- **PostalCodeResolverTest:** Assertion untuk kode pos 40114/40132 menerima tipe string atau int (karena data bisa keduanya). - **RegionCollectionTest:** Expected `toTitleCase('DKI JAKARTA')` disesuaikan menjadi `"Dki Jakarta"` (sesuai perilaku per kata). - **NusantaraTest:** Assertion `postalCodes()` menerima elemen string atau int.
---
## 5. Dokumentasi & Konfigurasi
### 5.1 CHANGELOG - **File:** `CHANGELOG.md` - **Isi:** Format Keep a Changelog, section [Unreleased] + rilis awal 1.0.0.
### 5.2 .env.example - **File:** `.env.example` - **Isi:** NUSANTARA_DRIVER, NUSANTARA_CACHE_TTL, NUSANTARA_CACHE_STORE, NUSANTARA_DATA_PATH, NUSANTARA_FUZZY_THRESHOLD, NUSANTARA_SEARCH_MAX_RESULTS.
### 5.3 README — Testing - **Perubahan:** Penjelasan cara generate coverage: `--coverage-text` dan `--coverage-html build/coverage` (dengan PCOV/Xdebug).
### 5.4 phpunit.xml - **Perubahan:** Konfigurasi coverage report dihapus dari XML agar `phpunit` default exit 0 tanpa driver coverage; coverage dijalankan lewat opsi CLI.
---
## 6. File yang Ditambah / Diubah (Daftar)
| Aksi | File | |--------|------| | Edit | `composer.json` | | Edit | `src/Support/Cache.php` | | Edit | `.github/workflows/tests.yml` | | Tambah | `tests/Unit/CacheTest.php` | | Tambah | `tests/Unit/RegionCollectionTest.php` | | Tambah | `tests/Unit/RegionLevelTest.php` | | Tambah | `tests/Unit/NusantaraTest.php` | | Tambah | `tests/Feature/InstallCommandTest.php` | | Tambah | `tests/Feature/SeedCommandTest.php` | | Tambah | `tests/Feature/ClearCacheCommandTest.php` | | Edit | `tests/Unit/PostalCodeResolverTest.php` | | Edit | `tests/Unit/RegionCollectionTest.php` (assertion) | | Edit | `tests/Unit/NusantaraTest.php` (assertion) | | Tambah | `CHANGELOG.md` | | Tambah | `.env.example` | | Edit | `README.md` | | Edit | `phpunit.xml` |

MESSAGE.value:
# Ringkasan Perubahan — Production Readiness Nusantara
## 1. Perbaikan Bug / Critical
### 1.1 Autoload NusantaraSeeder - **Masalah:** Class `Nusantara\Database\Seeders\NusantaraSeeder` tidak ter-autoload → `php artisan nusantara:seed` error "Class not found". - **Perubahan:** Di `composer.json` ditambah `"classmap": ["database/seeders"]` pada `autoload`. - **File:** `composer.json`
### 1.2 Cache::flush() tidak lengkap - **Masalah:** `flush()` hanya menghapus key `provinces`; key lain (regencies, districts, villages, postal) tetap di cache. - **Perubahan:** - Jika cache store mendukung tags (Redis, Memcached): `get()` dan `forget()` memakai tag `nusantara`, `flush()` memanggil `tags(['nusantara'])->flush()`. - Jika tidak (file/database): fallback tetap hanya menghapus key `provinces`. - **File:** `src/Support/Cache.php`
---
## 2. CI / Workflow
### 2.1 Laravel 12 di matrix - **Perubahan:** Laravel `12.*` ditambah ke matrix GitHub Actions (dengan exclude PHP 8.1 × 12). - **File:** `.github/workflows/tests.yml`
---
## 3. Unit & Feature Tests Baru
### 3.1 Unit — Cache - **File:** `tests/Unit/CacheTest.php` - **Isi:** Key helpers (`keyProvinces`, `keyRegencies`, dll), `get()` dengan TTL 0 vs TTL > 0, `forget()`, `flush()`.
### 3.2 Unit — RegionCollection - **File:** `tests/Unit/RegionCollectionTest.php` - **Isi:** `whereName()`, `codes()`, `names()`, `toDropdown()`, `titleCase()`, `toTitleCase()`.
### 3.3 Unit — RegionLevel - **File:** `tests/Unit/RegionLevelTest.php` - **Isi:** `fromCode()` tiap level, `label()`, edge case (empty, trim).
### 3.4 Unit — Nusantara - **File:** `tests/Unit/NusantaraTest.php` - **Isi:** `find()`, `coordinates()`, `regencies()` (by code/nama), `postalCodes()`, `hierarchy()`, edge cases.
### 3.5 Feature — Commands - **InstallCommand:** `tests/Feature/InstallCommandTest.php` — publish config, install dengan `--migrate`. - **SeedCommand:** `tests/Feature/SeedCommandTest.php` — validasi driver & `--only`, sukses seed. - **ClearCacheCommand:** `tests/Feature/ClearCacheCommandTest.php` — perintah berjalan sukses.
---
## 4. Perbaikan Test yang Sudah Ada
- **PostalCodeResolverTest:** Assertion untuk kode pos 40114/40132 menerima tipe string atau int (karena data bisa keduanya). - **RegionCollectionTest:** Expected `toTitleCase('DKI JAKARTA')` disesuaikan menjadi `"Dki Jakarta"` (sesuai perilaku per kata). - **NusantaraTest:** Assertion `postalCodes()` menerima elemen string atau int.
---
## 5. Dokumentasi & Konfigurasi
### 5.1 CHANGELOG - **File:** `CHANGELOG.md` - **Isi:** Format Keep a Changelog, section [Unreleased] + rilis awal 1.0.0.
### 5.2 .env.example - **File:** `.env.example` - **Isi:** NUSANTARA_DRIVER, NUSANTARA_CACHE_TTL, NUSANTARA_CACHE_STORE, NUSANTARA_DATA_PATH, NUSANTARA_FUZZY_THRESHOLD, NUSANTARA_SEARCH_MAX_RESULTS.
### 5.3 README — Testing - **Perubahan:** Penjelasan cara generate coverage: `--coverage-text` dan `--coverage-html build/coverage` (dengan PCOV/Xdebug).
### 5.4 phpunit.xml - **Perubahan:** Konfigurasi coverage report dihapus dari XML agar `phpunit` default exit 0 tanpa driver coverage; coverage dijalankan lewat opsi CLI.
---
## 6. File yang Ditambah / Diubah (Daftar)

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
# Ringkasan Perubahan — Production Readiness Nusantara
## 1. Perbaikan Bug / Critical
### 1.1 Autoload NusantaraSeeder - **Masalah:** Class `Nusantara\Database\Seeders\NusantaraSeeder` tidak ter-autoload → `php artisan nusantara:seed` error "Class not found". - **Perubahan:** Di `composer.json` ditambah `"classmap": ["database/seeders"]` pada `autoload`. - **File:** `composer.json`
### 1.2 Cache::flush() tidak lengkap - **Masalah:** `flush()` hanya menghapus key `provinces`; key lain (regencies, districts, villages, postal) tetap di cache. - **Perubahan:** - Jika cache store mendukung tags (Redis, Memcached): `get()` dan `forget()` memakai tag `nusantara`, `flush()` memanggil `tags(['nusantara'])->flush()`. - Jika tidak (file/database): fallback tetap hanya menghapus key `provinces`. - **File:** `src/Support/Cache.php`
---
## 2. CI / Workflow
### 2.1 Laravel 12 di matrix - **Perubahan:** Laravel `12.*` ditambah ke matrix GitHub Actions (dengan exclude PHP 8.1 × 12). - **File:** `.github/workflows/tests.yml`
---
## 3. Unit & Feature Tests Baru
### 3.1 Unit — Cache - **File:** `tests/Unit/CacheTest.php` - **Isi:** Key helpers (`keyProvinces`, `keyRegencies`, dll), `get()` dengan TTL 0 vs TTL > 0, `forget()`, `flush()`.
### 3.2 Unit — RegionCollection - **File:** `tests/Unit/RegionCollectionTest.php` - **Isi:** `whereName()`, `codes()`, `names()`, `toDropdown()`, `titleCase()`, `toTitleCase()`.
### 3.3 Unit — RegionLevel - **File:** `tests/Unit/RegionLevelTest.php` - **Isi:** `fromCode()` tiap level, `label()`, edge case (empty, trim).
### 3.4 Unit — Nusantara - **File:** `tests/Unit/NusantaraTest.php` - **Isi:** `find()`, `coordinates()`, `regencies()` (by code/nama), `postalCodes()`, `hierarchy()`, edge cases.
### 3.5 Feature — Commands - **InstallCommand:** `tests/Feature/InstallCommandTest.php` — publish config, install dengan `--migrate`. - **SeedCommand:** `tests/Feature/SeedCommandTest.php` — validasi driver & `--only`, sukses seed. - **ClearCacheCommand:** `tests/Feature/ClearCacheCommandTest.php` — perintah berjalan sukses.
---
## 4. Perbaikan Test yang Sudah Ada
- **PostalCodeResolverTest:** Assertion untuk kode pos 40114/40132 menerima tipe string atau int (karena data bisa keduanya). - **RegionCollectionTest:** Expected `toTitleCase('DKI JAKARTA')` disesuaikan menjadi `"Dki Jakarta"` (sesuai perilaku per kata). - **NusantaraTest:** Assertion `postalCodes()` menerima elemen string atau int.
---
## 5. Dokumentasi & Konfigurasi
### 5.1 CHANGELOG - **File:** `CHANGELOG.md` - **Isi:** Format Keep a Changelog, section [Unreleased] + rilis awal 1.0.0.
### 5.2 .env.example - **File:** `.env.example` - **Isi:** NUSANTARA_DRIVER, NUSANTARA_CACHE_TTL, NUSANTARA_CACHE_STORE, NUSANTARA_DATA_PATH, NUSANTARA_FUZZY_THRESHOLD, NUSANTARA_SEARCH_MAX_RESULTS.
### 5.3 README — Testing - **Perubahan:** Penjelasan cara generate coverage: `--coverage-text` dan `--coverage-html build/coverage` (dengan PCOV/Xdebug).
### 5.4 phpunit.xml - **Perubahan:** Konfigurasi coverage report dihapus dari XML agar `phpunit` default exit 0 tanpa driver coverage; coverage dijalankan lewat opsi CLI.
---
## 6. File yang Ditambah / Diubah (Daftar)
| Aksi | File | |--------|------| | Edit | `composer.json` | | Edit | `src/Support/Cache.php` | | Edit | `.github/workflows/tests.yml` | | Tambah | `tests/Unit/CacheTest.php` | | Tambah | `tests/Unit/RegionCollectionTest.php` | | Tambah | `tests/Unit/RegionLevelTest.php` | | Tambah | `tests/Unit/NusantaraTest.php` | | Tambah | `tests/Feature/InstallCommandTest.php` | | Tambah | `tests/Feature/SeedCommandTest.php` | | Tambah | `tests/Feature/ClearCacheCommandTest.php` | | Edit | `tests/Unit/PostalCodeResolverTest.php` | | Edit | `tests/Unit/RegionCollectionTest.php` (assertion) | | Edit | `tests/Unit/NusantaraTest.php` (assertion) | | Tambah | `CHANGELOG.md` | | Tambah | `.env.example` | | Edit | `README.md` | | Edit | `phpunit.xml` |
